description.p: Compute the minimum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.
Returns the minimum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

discussion.p: The Min function computes the minimum value of the expression over all rows that satisfy the expression.

example.caption: Min() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT Min(Order_Details.Quantity) AS MinQuantity FROM [Order Details] Order_Details =1
